titles: The dyaloge bytwene Iullius the seconde, Genius, and saynt Peter. [...]
Dialoge betwene Julius the seconde, Genius, and Saynt Peter
author: Andrelini, Publio Fausto, 1462-1518, attrib. author. aut
Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536, attrib. author. aut
publisher: By Iohn Byddell, dwellynge in fletestrete at the sygne of the Sonne agaynste the Cundyte. The yere of our lorde,
notes: Attributed to Desiderius Erasmus or Publio Fausto Andrelinus.
Another edition of STC 14841.5, published ca. 1534, with title: The dialoge betwene Iulius the seconde, genius, and saynt Peter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Julius --  II, --  Pope, 1443-1513 --  Early works to 1800.
